items.title: Awesome Coq
items.content_text:
### Resources / Tutorials and Hints

*   [Learn X in Y minutes where X=Coq](https://learnxinyminutes.com/docs/coq/) - Whirlwind tour of Coq as a language.

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Mathematics / Waveform Generator

*   [micropython-npyfile (⭐4)](https://github.com/jonnor/micropython-npyfile/) - Numpy .npy file support for MicroPython, supports read/write/streaming.
items.content_html:
Mathematics / Waveform Generator

  • micropython-npyfile (⭐4) - Numpy .npy file support for MicroPython, supports read/write/streaming.

items.title: Awesome Rest
items.content_text:
### Public REST APIs To Use In Tests / Symfony2

*   [Mockae](https://mockae.com/) - Fake REST API powered by Lua.
items.content_html:
Public REST APIs To Use In Tests / Symfony2

  • Mockae - Fake REST API powered by Lua.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Integrations / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-socket-io (⭐270)](https://github.com/rodgc/ngx-socket-io) - [Socket.IO](https://socket.io/) module for Angular.

### File Upload / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [uppy](https://uppy.io/docs/angular/) - [Uppy (⭐30k)](https://github.com/transloadit/uppy) is a sleek, modular JavaScript file uploader that integrates seamlessly with any application. It’s fast, has a comprehensible API and lets you worry about more important problems than building a file uploader.
items.content_html:
Integrations / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-socket-io (⭐270) - Socket.IO module for Angular.

File Upload / Google Developer Experts

  • uppy - Uppy (⭐30k) is a sleek, modular JavaScript file uploader that integrates seamlessly with any application. It’s fast, has a comprehensible API and lets you worry about more important problems than building a file uploader.

items.title: Awesome Gnome
items.content_text:
### Productivity and Time

*   [Newelle (⭐414)](https://github.com/qwersyk/Newelle) - Virtual assistant (local, based on GPT4All) that interacts with the system by running shell commands and execute Python code.

### Multimedia

*   [Fotema](https://flathub.org/apps/app.fotema.Fotema) - Photo gallery with support for iOS Live Photos and Samsung Motion Photos and with map view.

### Development and Design

*   [Cartero](https://cartero.danirod.es) - Graphical HTTP client to perform HTTP requests and test web APIs.
items.content_html:
Productivity and Time

  • Newelle (⭐414) - Virtual assistant (local, based on GPT4All) that interacts with the system by running shell commands and execute Python code.

Multimedia

  • Fotema - Photo gallery with support for iOS Live Photos and Samsung Motion Photos and with map view.

Development and Design

  • Cartero - Graphical HTTP client to perform HTTP requests and test web APIs.

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### JSON

*   [JSON Toolkit (⭐46)](https://github.com/sourcemeta/jsontoolkit) - JSON, JSON Pointer, JSON Schema, and JSONL library for C++20. \[AGPL/Commercial]
items.content_html:
JSON

  • JSON Toolkit (⭐46) - JSON, JSON Pointer, JSON Schema, and JSONL library for C++20. [AGPL/Commercial]

items.title: Awesome Graphql
items.content_text:
### Miscellaneous / React

*   [graphql-sunset (⭐6)](https://github.com/sophiabits/graphql-sunset) - Quickly and easily add support for the `Sunset` header to your GraphQL server, to better communicate upcoming breaking changes.

### Tools - Editors & IDEs & Explorers / React

*   [Bruno (⭐36k)](https://github.com/usebruno/bruno) - Fast, open source API client, which stores collections offline-only in a Git-friendly plain text markup language.

### Blogs - Security / React

*   [Authorization Patterns in GraphQL](https://www.osohq.com/post/graphql-authorization)
items.content_html:
Miscellaneous / React

  • graphql-sunset (⭐6) - Quickly and easily add support for the Sunset header to your GraphQL server, to better communicate upcoming breaking changes.

Tools - Editors & IDEs & Explorers / React

  • Bruno (⭐36k) - Fast, open source API client, which stores collections offline-only in a Git-friendly plain text markup language.

Blogs - Security / React

  • Authorization Patterns in GraphQL
